Articles.Content: so last night, I was playing around with the contracts and I noticed that unless I accepted a contract, it would spawn again. and again. and again. and, well, you get the idea. and even if I declined it, it would still appear. this is rather annoying because if I do not want a contract, it will still come up and clutter my list. has anyone else noticed this, and squad, could you put a limit on how often a contract spawns? please?

Yeah that happens to me too, and I assume everyone, you'll just keep getting the same (or very similar) contacts from different 'companies', and then eventually maybe it'll change to something else. The thing is though that if there's a new or important contact (like the explore ones) then it'll take priority, so it's not like the repetitive ones are blocking you from getting a good contact.

Squad are still tweaking the contract system so I don't know if there's any changes planned.
